This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in {{BE}} 1.9.0, which assumes at least some familiarity with the ''Bedrock Edition'' 1.8 releases.

== Mobs ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
| [[Pillager]]
| [[File:Pillager JE1.png|128px|center]]
| -
|
{{Drop|Item|Crossbow|8.5%}}
{{Drop|Item|Arrow|0-2}}
|
* Pillagers are a subset of illagers.
* They are available through Experimental Gameplay.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|[[Passive mob]]s
|
| Now randomly enter [[Breeding|love mode]].
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Blocks}}
|-
|[[Moss stone]]
|[[File:Mossy_Cobblestone_JE2_BE1.png|84px]]
| Has been renamed "Mossy Cobblestone".
|-
|[[Nether brick fence]]
|[[File:Nether_Brick_Fence_BE2.png|84px]]
|
* Changed the crafting recipe 4 nether brick blocks and 2 nether brick items.
** The previous crafting recipe is now used to make a nether brick [[wall]].
|-
|[[Smooth sandstone]] and<br> [[smooth red sandstone]]
|{{animate|Smooth_Sandstone BE1.png;Smooth_Red_Sandstone BE1.png|84px}}
| Have been renamed "Cut Sandstone" and "Cut Red Sandstone", respectively.{{verify|The corresponding images display smooth sandstone, not cut sandstone. What is this entry supposed to mean?}}
|-
|[[Sign]]
|[[File:Oak_Standing_Sign_(S)_JE2_BE2.png|84px]]
|
* Has been renamed to "Oak Sign".
** An oak sign now requires oak planks to craft, instead of any wood planks.
|-
|[[Cauldron]]
|[[File:Cauldron_BE1.png|84px]]
|
* Can now be used to hold [[lava]].
** Will burn entities inside it and emit light.
|-
|[[Tripwire]]
|[[File:Tripwire_(NESW).png|84px]]
| Are now activated when broken, unless broken with [[shears]].
|-
|[[Wool]]
|[[File:White_Wool_JE2_BE2.png|84px]]
| Renamed white colored wool to "White Wool".
|}

== Biomes ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Biomes}} 
|-
|[[Bamboo jungle]]
|[[File:Bamboo Jungle.png|184px]]
|Bamboo Jungles generate in large patches within regular jungles. Trees are much less dense in this variant than in the main jungle, comparable to the [[jungle edge]], but boasts countless amounts of [[bamboo]] across its landscape. [[Podzol]] generates on the jungle floor in this biome. It is home to all jungle mobs, including [[panda]]s, which are exclusive to this biome.
| - 
|-
|[[Bamboo jungle hills]]
|[[File:Bamboo Jungle Hills.png|184px|center]]
|The bamboo jungle hills biome is similar to the bamboo jungle, though with steeper terrain just like the regular jungle hills variant. Large amounts of bamboo cover the landscape, and patches of podzol replace [[grass block]]s.
| - 
|}
